ThermoElectric.kpoints

ThermoElectric.kpoints(path2kpoints: str, delimiter: Optional[str] = None, skip_rows: int = 0) → numpy.ndarray[source]

Create a 2D array of temperature sampling

Parameters

  • path2kpoints (str) – Path to kpoints file

  • delimiter (str) – Default it None for ,

  • skip_rows (int) – Number of lines to skip, default is 0

Returns

wave_points – Wave vectors

Return type

np.ndarray
